retention_statement: Retain 5 years after receipt of payment, then microfilm or scan records according to Library of Virginia's standards/guidelines; retain records in new format permanently. Transfer original camera negative to Imaging Services Branch of the Library of Virginia. Destroy originals after quality control inspection verifies information was successfully transferred to new format. Document of original records after reformatting onCertificate of Records Disposal(RM-3 form).
legal_citation: Code of Virginia, § 45.1-241. When fund dissolved, remaining monies will be dispersed at the direction of the Fund Advisory Board.
